parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key under which the data is stored in localStorage.

parameters.name: options.fallback
parameters.description: The value to return if the key does not exist or parsing fails.

returnValues.name: value
returnValues.description: The current value of the key.

returnValues.name: remove
returnValues.description: Specifically removes the entry associated with the provided key.

returnValues.name: set
returnValues.description: Serializes and saves the value to localStorage.

returnValues.name: update
returnValues.description: Updates the value using a callback function (similar to setState).
